info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 06 at 10:18AM AST until October 06 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit are likely. * WHERE...The urban and coastal sections from west to northwest, San Juan and vicinity and northeast Puerto Rico, Culebra, Vieques and St. Croix. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
